sections.content: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever.
Every book provides a chance to try another life you could have lived. To see how things would be different if you had made other choices.
Would you have done anything different, if you had the chance to undo your regrets?
I'm in a spaceship. I'm the sole survivor. I'm on a mission to save the world.
The problem is, I don't remember any of that.
I woke up with amnesia in a strange ship, with two dead crewmates and a talking alien blob.
